h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: Once he dies, he'll drop the Mountain Patroller Spirit for you to absorb and get all your gourd's health charges back. As an added bonus, you can inspect this other sealed building to find a **Treasure Chest** on the left side, which usually contains a Blood of the Iron Bull and other items.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Once he dies, he'll drop the Mountain Patroller Spirit for you to absorb and get all your gourd's health charges back. As an added bonus, you can inspect this other sealed building to find a **Treasure Chest** on the left side, which usually contains a Blood of the Iron Bull and other items.
